name: com.ektishaf.api
description:
This is an official package for Blockchain API which enables the game to interact with EVM based smart contracts with ease, whether it be NFTs or other tokens. 

Main features: 
▪ Create new wallets or import existing wallets at runtime 
▪ Seemless transaction experience, no need to go out of the game 
▪ Build-in NFT smart contract provided for implemention right away

Note: Please keep track of the latest updates on our official website
https://www.ektishaf.com

samples.description: Contains a demo to demonstrate blockchain communication
